title: How I Met Your Mother
short_plot_summary: Ted Mosby recounts the story of how he met his children's mother to his son and daughter, while recounting his adventures in New York City with his friends.
explanation: The mother, the central mystery of the show
A yellow umbrella, symbolizes the fateful meeting between Ted and the Mother
A beer, representing the friends hanging out at the bar, MacLaren's
A taxi, representing New York City where the series takes place
